parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action associated with the task.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: The list of Amazon Braket resources associated with the quantum task. (dict) --- The Amazon Braket resource and the association type. The Amazon Braket resource arn. The association type for the specified Amazon Braket resource arn.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The association type for the specified Amazon Braket resource arn.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The client token associated with the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: deviceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the device to run the task on.

parameters.name: outputS3Bucket
parameters.description: The S3 bucket to store task result files in.

parameters.name: outputS3KeyPrefix
parameters.description: The key prefix for the location in the S3 bucket to store task results in.

parameters.name: shots
parameters.description: The number of shots to use for the task.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to be added to the quantum task you're creating. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: quantumTaskArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the task created by the request.
